29. $y=\cfrac{x^2-4x+3}{|x-3|}=\cfrac{(x-3)(x-1)}{|x-3|}=\begin{cases} x-1,\ x>3,\\ 1-x,\ x<3.\end{cases}.$
$$% TIKZ_ID{task029-solution-fig1}
